formalMetadata.description: A text that requires a reading ability above the upper secondary education level, with a summary at the bottom that requires a reading ability higher than lower secondary education level.
formalMetadata.title: Difficult text with hard-to-read summary

purpose.p: This test case is intended to fail because the summary that is provided is still too difficult. Only the reading level is tested here, not the other aspects of the document (descriptive section titles, expanded forms for abbreviations, etcetera).

expertGuidance.p: Check whether the reading level needed to understand the summary is higher than lower secondary education level.

questionText.p: Does the summary provided really help you to understand the rest of the content?
Helpt de samenvatting u echt om de rest van het document te begrijpen?

functionalOutcome.p: The summary at the end of the document is too hard to read for people with a reading level that is not higher than lower secondary education level.

techComment.p: This test case does not map to a WCAG 2.0 technique or failure.
